name: job-finder-extension
description: This is a job finder extension for Google Chrome

scripts.build:js: esbuild src/popup.js src/background.js src/contentScript.js src/resumeParser.js src/jobMatcher.js src/utils.js --outdir=dist --bundle --minify --platform=browser --target=es2017
scripts.copy:static: cpx "src/manifest.json" dist && cpx "src/*.html" dist && cpx "src/*.css" dist && cpx "src/assets/**/*" dist/assets
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:js && npm run copy:static
